docs.snippet: Gibraltar’s bid to join European soccer’s governing body as a full member, over Spain’s objections, will be decided on Friday as this longtime dispute mixing sports and politics continues....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gibraltar’s bid to join European soccer’s governing body as a full member, over Spain’s objections, will be decided on Friday as this longtime dispute mixing sports and politics continues.
docs.abstract: Gibraltar’s longstanding bid to join European soccer’s governing body as a full member, over Spain’s objections, is set to be decided with vote; Spain argues that Gibraltar, tiny tip of the Iberian Peninsula that for centuries has endured as a tug of war between Spain and Britain, is a territory that should not stand on its own, in soccer or otherwise.

headline.seo: Gibraltar Moves Toward UEFA Membership as Spain Resists
headline.main: Gibraltar Moves Closer to Soccer Independence

byline.contributor: Alina Totti contributed reporting from Madrid.
